data.actual_result: it shows that you denied a perm AND it shows that u granted a perm, but without perm underneath
data.expected_result: latest entry should only show that u denied a perm
data.short_description: [Audit Log] denying a channel permission of a role after granting it will create an "granted permission for role" without a permission underneath it
data.steps_to_repro: - create a channel - add a role to channel permission - grant it one permissiom - save - deny exact that channel permission u granted to that role - expand newest audit log entry
